I really like this brand and feel like you get a nice quality shirt for the price -  again, I plan on ordering more shirts from this brand because they do offer a quality, cute, and affordable product.

I feel so bad for my daughter.  I got one for her and one for myself.  I know now to check mine out before wearing it.  She tried it on and it was big on her.  She went on an important school trip and decided to take it.  She just told me it tore at the underarm, like she was fat.  How horrible for a 15yr old to feel like.  I had to assure her it was that.  It was just poorly sewn.  When she gets home, I'll see what I can do.  I'm hoping it's just the seem and that it can be repaired.  I bought it specifically for her school band concerts. It is nice, not fancy nor like the pic, but still very nice.  It feels soft but poorly made.

评论详情: Loved the picture on Amazon and when I received it (Large sixe) it was so nice. The fabric is a soft knit and the sleeves stripes are like velvet. Love it, love it.
The fit was weird. It’s cute but for kinda tight/weird around the neck/shoulder area

Blouse exactly as pictured. I went up a size larger as the blouse tapers at the waistline…did an exchange. The blouses did have a very a strange smell to them…almost like a HEAVY smoke scent. Once washed before wearing, the scent was gone.

As someone with a somewhat fluffier midsection, I was hesitant about a shirt like this because this kind of material can sometimes be clingy, revealing those unwanted curves. But I loved the sleeve detailing on this so much I decided to give it a try. It’s a lightweight airy material that’s comfy and breathable. Considering it is lighter, I was waiting to see if it would snag on something like my nails and thankfully it hasn’t so far. For me, it’s about the versatility. It has enough length and looseness at the waist that you could wear it tucked in or out. I’m a mom who’s got a bit of a mom pooch so for me, I preferred to have mine tucked into high waist pants. In the case of the picture I’m uploading, I wore it tucked in with (what I wore as) high waisted “leather” pants. I also added a cincher belt to accentuate the waist and help camouflage some of my unwanted bulges. But as you can see, it does hug the curves so I would say size accordingly and be mindful of this when choosing your undergarments. I would say it fits pretty much true to size but you may want to go up a size if you’re looking for a looser fit.
This shirt is so pretty and light!  The sleeves are a little bit of a rougher material, but it is not too noticeable for me.

For what it is and the price it's cute. Its so more stretchy than I thought & less sweaterish and thin. Go over sized if you want it to be baggie like in advert. I am. 5.4 160 got a large and its skin tight with stretch. Not over stretched not baggie. If I wasn't loosing weight I would return and get larger size....so still cute enough to return and reorder. Also It's hard to tell front from back.
Super cute fit!! Could dress up with dress pants or go casual with jeans!
Didn’t fit good .

Fits TTS, very cute and super comfortable. Fabric is made well, and looks great on. Perfect for fall!!
This top is great. True to size, great fabrics, well-made, and looks fabulous on. I love the creamy beige color too. Highly recommend!

This top is basically what I expected, except the solid fabric is much more thin. The billowed sleeves have tiny cabled lines down see-through mesh that gives this basic shirt a fabulous twist. The fit is slightly form-fitting, but not tight. I’m 115lbs, 34A, 27”Waist and the Small is perfect.

This is a nice top with sleeve detail. I find that it runs a little small. So if you want a looser fit or a fit like on the model size up. The sleeves take some time to get used to when wearing. The actual bodice is made of a nice stretchy fabric. Can be worn dressed up or with jeans.
The sleeves are a little tight but otherwise it fits well. It goes well with flared jeans tucked or with a black pencil skirt or even just regular jeans.
The sleeves are really pretty but kinda disappointed with the rest.  It's very thin and I have to be very careful about what I wear under it.  I wear a vest over it.

I got this shirt for my daughter, and she loves it!  The color is a really nice gray/silver.  The fabric is stretchy but not flimsy.  The fit is what we expected, but a nice surprise is that it's a little long - this made my daughter really happy because she has a long torso and long arms, and we can have some difficulty finding shirts that fit her well.

It's elegant and interesting. I love the lace sleeves being vertical stripes instead of a floral pattern. It's gives it a real minimalist, deco, kind of vibe. It fits great, and feels great. Looks awesome with shorts or jeans. I'm a fan!

评论概述: Just Ok, not as good as I expected
评论详情: This top looks beautiful on the model and in seller’s photos, but no so much in person. It’s an “ok” top.  If I saw it in a store I’d probably keep going. The fabric is not as I expected and it feels like a swim/sun shirt fabric. Sort of clingy and shiny… not a fan. The sleeves are actually quite pretty and I wish the fabric for the body was a rayon or quality soft cotton. Then I think it would warrant higher ratings. I’m usually a small or medium and I ordered a large based on other reviewers. It’s really too large for me.  I should have ordered a medium. 5”8” tall 130 lbs for reference. In my opinion the fabric ruins it. Looks inexpensive.

评论概述: A Dressy Top for the Autumn/Winter Season.
评论详情: The design of this top is a bit distinguished than other tops for its sleeves and two kinds of fabrics in one top. The mock neck detail is an useful part of cold weather outfits, and the body part is knitted but not too bulky. The sleeves are a mesh kind and semi-transparent, and they are the highlight of this sweater top. The length comes below the belt line, and I feel warm and soft in this knitted top. Overall, this top is basic but has a bit of twist and an item that anybody can try it out.

评论概述: It's too stylish to be a t-shirt.
评论详情: I've been daring to get more gray in my , since my hair is turning gray and my skin is deep winter. They say that gray is definitely a good color for my skin and changing hair. They knew, but I didn't. I definitely will be incorporating more gray into my wardrobe after loving this shirt on.  It's definitely t-shirt material, makes it very comfortable to wear. It's versatile enough to wear this with some dressy slacks or skirt or dress down with jeans. The sleeves has this embroidered work on top of sheer. I think it's lovely. It's definitely unique, but not flashy.  It's true to size. I am 5'4 inches tall wearing an extra large. See video to see how this shirt looks on my body type.

I find this top to be really pretty - I love the color, and the fit is perfect.  I would say that the top is true to size.  It's not baggy, but it's not tight either.  It's not too heavy, but not real thin, except for the sleeves, which are Mesh Lace.  You will want to be careful as not to get the sleeves caught on something.  I will probably wear it with jeans, but if I still worked, I would definitely wear it with dress pants.  It comes with a crewneck instead of a turtleneck, which I love.  I've never been a huge fan of turtlenecks.

评论概述: Trendy blouse - like the sheer sleeves and design
评论详情: I liked the design - different than the usual blouses given the mesh arms. The mauve color is nice. I think you can side down though as it is not a form fitting shirt.

Cute top to wear dressing up or work. The fabric is ribbed knit & stretchy. The neckline fits different than pictured, it is higher. The sleeves give this top some flair with the mesh design. Comfortable to wear… but it is revealing enough to show bra straps.

This blouse didn't work for me, personally, as the upper arms are very, very tight. The rest of the shirt fits true-to-size and is very stretchy, but the arms are too tight to be comfortable. They're also very see-through, though the stripe detailing is very pretty. If you've got smaller arms, you'll probably be ok.

This shirt fits great. I got a medium (usually use S/M) as I would like something more form fitting. It shapes the body without being over clingy,  and doesn't over accentuate my mom belly. Perfect fit shoulder wise.  I got the yellow and it is more of a rusty/dirty gold tone. Go with a size up if you want it to fit more like the seller's picture. Gave it 4 stars because of the sleeves. While they look beautiful, the ribbing actually feels like its scratching my skin, I will be hopping that it will soften after a couple of washes.
My biggest issue with this is that in the photos the shirt looked green, the color was listed as yellow and what came was something in between. The shirt itself is cute

评论概述: Pretty and Fits Well but Pretty Fragile Fabric
评论详情: This is an easy and pretty upgrade of a top to easily dress up jeans, white denim, etc., but I'm a little concerned about how easily it might snag and be ruined for dress use. We'll see!

Love the mock neck and mesh sleeves on this ribbed top. The material is stretchy (made of 93% viscose and 7% elastane), which was unexpected as I thought this would be more sweater-like from the photos, but it feels more akin to an athleisure blouse. I found that the small fits true to size, but since the material is clingier than expected, I would recommend to size up if you like a looser fit.
Fits me well and the fabric feels good on my sensitive skin.This quickly became my favorite shirt. It really is cute and soft
